recipe.title: Meatballs in Marinara
recipe.description: Tender Italian meatballs in rich tomato sauce

steps.descr: Mix beef, egg, breadcrumbs, Parmesan, and garlic
steps.instructions: Mix beef, egg, breadcrumbs, Parmesan, and garlic

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by mixing the beef, egg, breadcrumbs, Parmesan, and garlic together. Don't overwork the mixture, just until it's combined.
Now, let's shape the mixture into lovely golf ball-sized meatballs. This is where you can get a bit hands-on!

steps.descr: Brown meatballs in a pan on all sides
steps.instructions: Brown meatballs in a pan on all sides

on_enter.say: Let's brown those meatballs in a hot pan. You want a nice golden crust on all sides, which will add a fantastic flavour to our sauce.

steps.descr: Add tinned tomatoes and basil to pan
steps.instructions: Add tinned tomatoes and basil to pan

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Now, add the tinned tomatoes and a handful of fresh basil to the pan. Give it a good stir.
Time to let it simmer gently for twenty-five to thirty minutes. You'll know it's ready when the sauce is thick and the flavours have melded beautifully.
While the sauce is simmering, let's cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions. Make sure it's al dente, with a bit of bite.

steps.descr: Serve meatballs and sauce over pasta
steps.instructions: Serve meatballs and sauce over pasta

on_enter.say: Fantastic! It's time to serve. Place the spaghetti on plates and top with those beautiful meatballs and sauce. Enjoy your meal!

notes.text:
Don't overwork the meat mixture
Browning adds flavor to the sauce
Add a pinch of sugar to balance acidity
